column1: Footnotes:
Total Marriages (Number):
Total may include marriages where the previous marital status of groom or brides were not reported. Previous marital status refers to a person's marital status prior to the current marriage.
Total Marriages -> First Marriages (Number):
Refer to marriages where neither party had previously been married.
Total Marriages -> Remarriages (Number):
Refer to marriages where either or both parties had previously been married.
Total Marriages -> Remarriages -> Remarriages - One Partner (Number):
Refer to marriages where either party had previously been married.
Total Marriages -> Remarriages -> Remarriages - Both Partners (Number):
Refer to marriages where both parties had previously been married.
Resident Marriages (Number):
Resident marriages refer to marriages where either or both the grooms and brides are residents.
Proportion Of First Marriages - Grooms (Per Cent):
Refer to grooms who had not previously been married as a proportion of all grooms.
Proportion Of First Marriages - Brides (Per Cent):
Refer to brides who had not previously been married as a proportion of all brides.
Proportion Of Inter-Ethnic Marriages (Per Cent):
Data on inter-ethnic marriages have been updated in 2023 to include only marriages where both parties are of different CMIO group.
Definitions
Marriages:

Total marriages comprise civil marriages registered under the Women's Charter and Muslim marriages registered under the Administration of Muslim Law Act. Data exclude civil marriages which were contracted overseas or under religious and customary rites, and were subsequently registered in Singapore in the reference year.
Notation:
na   not available or not applicable
nec  not elsewhere classified
nes  not elsewhere specified
-     nil or negligible or not significant
Notes
Numbers may not add up to the totals due to rounding.
Data are the latest available at the time of access or download. Some statistics, particularly those for the most recent time periods, are provisional and may be subject to revision at a later date.
Values are shown in Singapore dollars (unless otherwise specified).
